item.source: My Wildy Skull Keeps flashing really fast?

item.title: My Wildy Skull Keeps flashing really fast?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Hi I made a skull, say “safe” when you are safe and “danger” when you are in wildy.

I added this in:

Public boolean process()

if(nonWild()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@gre@Safe", 199); } else { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@Danger", 199); }

Does anyone no my problem to stop flashing?

Many Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: My Wildy Skull Keeps flashing really fast?
